search.query: |inputlookup WA_settings | fields value source | dedup value
| metadata type=hosts `webanalytics_sourcetypes` | dedup host | lookup WA_settings host AS host OUTPUTNEW value AS site | table host site | search site="$site$"

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" Web.uri="$uri$" ($status_y$) OR ($status_x$) $pageviews$ host="$host$" GROUPBY Web.status,$field$ | strcat "http_user_agent::" Web.http_user_agent pair_http_user_agent | strcat "ua_browser::" Web.ua_family "_" Web.ua_major "." Web.ua_minor pair_ua_browser | strcat "http_request::" Web.uri pair_http_request | strcat "http_referer::" Web.http_referer pair_http_referer | strcat "clientip::" Web.clientip pair_clientip | strcat "Server::" host pair_host | eval pairs=mvappend(pair_http_user_agent,pair_ua_browser,pair_http_request,pair_http_referer,pair_clientip,pair_host) | chart sum(count) over pairs by Web.status | addtotals | addtotals 3* fieldname="All 300s" | addtotals 4* fieldname="All 400s" | addtotals 5* fieldname="All 500s" | sort 100 -Total | eval temp=split(pairs,"::") | eval Field=mvindex(temp,0) | eval Value=mvindex(temp,1) | where len(Value)>0 AND NOT like(Value,"_.") | fields - temp | eval "$status_x_label$"=case(like("$status_x_label$","%3%"),'All 300s',like("$status_x_label$","%4%"),'All 400s',like("$status_x_label$","%5%"),'All 500s') | eval "$status_y_label$"=case(like("$status_y_label$","%3%"),'All 300s',like("$status_y_label$","%4%"),'All 400s',like("$status_y_label$","%5%"),'All 500s') | fillnull "$status_x_label$" value=0 | fillnull "$status_y_label$" value=0 | table pairs "$status_x_label$" "$status_y_label$" Total "All 300s" "All 400s" "All 500s" 3* 4* 5*

| tstats count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" Web.status>=400 Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.status,Web.http_user_agent,Web.ua_family,Web.ua_major,Web.ua_minor,Web.clientip host | strcat "http_user_agent::" Web.http_user_agent pair_http_user_agent | strcat "ua_browser::" Web.ua_family "_" Web.ua_major "." Web.ua_minor pair_ua_browser | strcat "clientip::" Web.clientip pair_clientip | strcat "Server::" host pair_host | eval pairs=mvappend(pair_http_user_agent,pair_ua_browser,pair_http_request,pair_http_referer,pair_clientip,pair_host) | chart count over pairs by Web.status | addtotals | sort 100 -Total | eval temp=split(pairs,"::") | eval Field=mvindex(temp,0) | eval Value=mvindex(temp,1) | fields - temp pairs | table Field Value 4* 5* Total

table.title: Web Server Client Errors (400s) by Request

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status>=400 Web.status<500) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.uri,Web.status | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over uri by status | rename uri AS http_request | addtotals | sort -Total

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status>=500) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.uri,Web.status | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over uri by status | rename uri AS http_request | addtotals | sort -Total

table.title: Web Server Client Errors (400s) by Referrer

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status>=400 Web.status<500) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.http_referer,Web.status | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over http_referer by status | addtotals | sort -Total

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status>=500) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.http_referer,Web.status | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over http_referer by status | addtotals | sort -Total

panel.title: Web Server Bad Request (400) by Server

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status=400) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.$splitby1$,host | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over "$splitby1$" by host | addtotals | sort -Total

panel.title: Web Server Failed User Authentication (401) by Server

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" Web.status=401 Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.$splitby2$,host | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over "$splitby2$" by host | addtotals | sort -Total

panel.title: Web Server Access Denied (403) by Server

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status=403) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.$splitby3$,host | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over "$splitby3$" by host | addtotals | sort -Total

panel.title: Web Server Not Found (404) by Server

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" host="$host$" (Web.status=404) Web.uri="$uri$" GROUPBY Web.$splitby4$,host | rename Web.* AS * | chart sum(count) AS count over "$splitby4$" by host | rename uri AS http_request | addtotals | sort -Total
